testCaseResult.testCaseName: Repository entity reference copy lifecycle test case
successfulAssertions: repository-test-case-base-01: Repository connector supplied to conformance suite.
repository-test-case-base-02: Metadata collection for repository connector supplied to conformance suite.
repository-entity-reference-copy-lifecycle-00: KafkaTopic entity type definition matches known type
repository-entity-reference-copy-lifecycle-01: KafkaTopic reference entity created; repository supports storage of reference copies.
repository-entity-reference-copy-lifecycle-02: KafkaTopic reference entity can be retrieved as EntitySummary.
repository-entity-reference-copy-lifecycle-03: KafkaTopic reference entity can be retrieved as EntityDetail.
repository-entity-reference-copy-lifecycle-04: KafkaTopic reference entity matches the entity that was saved.
repository-entity-reference-copy-lifecycle-05: KafkaTopic reference entity has no relationships.
repository-entity-reference-copy-lifecycle-06: KafkaTopic reference entity status cannot be updated.
repository-entity-reference-copy-lifecycle-06: KafkaTopic reference entity status cannot be updated.
repository-entity-reference-copy-lifecycle-07: KafkaTopic reference entity properties cannot be updated.
repository-entity-reference-copy-lifecycle-08: KafkaTopic reference entity type cannot be changed.
repository-entity-reference-copy-lifecycle-09: KafkaTopic reference entity identity cannot be changed.
repository-test-case-base-01: Repository connector supplied to conformance suite.
repository-test-case-base-02: Metadata collection for repository connector supplied to conformance suite.
unsuccessfulAssertions: Unexpected Exception Exception : CTS test repository-entity-reference-copy-lifecycle caught exception FunctionNotSupportedException from method purgeEntityReferenceCopy whilst trying to purge a reference copy of an entity of type KafkaTopic.
